name: Desert Safari: Jeep Driving 4x
description:
Desert Safari: Jeep Driving 4x4 Sim is very interesting adventure of desert jeep games rally in Sahara desert safari endless shores.This real desert safari game racing adventure makes you a skillful and expertise drifter.

Features :
Different 4x4 jeeps
Desert safari jeep games challenge
Different play modes
Time limited game
Coins scoring
Realistic graphics
Effective controls
